refnamediv.refpurpose: Row Insertion and Report Generation using XML Templates

refsect1.title: Preliminaries
refsect1.para: This sample program demonstrates the use of XML templates:

itemizedlist.listitem: Use the XS_U_3 SQL script to create a Web virtual directory that allows execution of the XML template.
Create a form that allows new records to be inserted into a table.
Use the form text fields as input parameters for the XML template.
The XML template (shippers.xml) will insert a new record using the form parameters. It makes an XML document using SQL/XML query, and renders it with an XML-T style sheet.
